70-DR-2023-900051.01
CIRCUIT COURT OF
TALLAPOOSA COUNTY, ALABAMA
PATRICK CRADDOCK, CLERK
IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF TALLAPOOSA COUNTY, ALABAMA
CHRISTOPHER BLAINE MCGREGOR,
Respondent,
v. CASE NO.: 70-DR-2023-900051.01
BRITTANY MICHELLE GILLILAND,
Petitioner.
MOTION FOR PETITIONER-MOTHER TO APPEAR VIA ZOOM
COMES NOW, Petitioner-Mother BRITTANY GILLILAND, by and through the
undersigned counsel of record, Barbara H. Agricola, with the law firm of Agricola Law, LLC, and
files this Motion for Petitioner-Mother to Appear Via Zoom for the June 11, 2024 status hearing.
In support thereof, Mother states as follows:
1. This matter is currently scheduled for a status hearing on June 11, 2025;
2. Mother is nine (9) months pregnant, and is expected to be due on or about June 14,
2025;
3. Based on the aforementioned, Mother respectfully requests this Honorable Court that
Mother appear via Zoom for the June 11, 2025 status hearing;
4. Permitting Mother to appear remotely via Zoom would not prejudice Father and the
hearing to proceed without further unnecessary delays or financial strain on Mother.
WHEREFORE, PREMISES CONSIDERED, Mother respectfully prays this
Honorable Court GRANT this Motion:
A. GRANT Mother to appear via Zoom for the June 11, 2025 Status Hearing;
B. Granting to Mother such other, further and general relief as to which in equity and
good conscience she may be entitled.
Respectfully submitted on June 2, 2025.
Brittany Michelle Gilliland v. Christopher Blaine McGregor
Circuit Court of Tallapoosa County, Alabama
Case No.: 70-DR-2023-900051.01
Motion to Appear Via Zoom
